incidents.name: Toll-Free and Long Code MMS Failures and Delays

incident_updates.body: Twilio MMS was degraded for 37 minutes between 10:01 and 10:38 Pacific Time on 08/14/2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced delays or failures when sending MMS Toll-Free and long code messages. The issue has now been resolved.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with MMS. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: 10DLC brand registrations for Canadian brands

incident_updates.body: Twilio 10 DLC brand registrations for Canadian brands were degraded between July 19th to August 9th. During this period of time, customers may have experienced 10DLC brand registration for Canadian brand failures. The issue has now been resolved for any new brands registered with Canadian Business Number. Twilio is working on a fix for the Brands submitted during the incident period. You may also alternatively delete the brand and register a new one.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with brand registration failures. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.
